video.name: VEGAN GINGERBREAD BAKED OATMEAL | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Vegan Gingerbread Baked Oatmeal. Moist gingerbread oat bars, 1 Bowl
FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2019/12/vegan-gingerbread-baked-oatmeal.html

Oats tossed with gingerbread spices, molasses, candied ginger and non dairy milk and baked to make moist gingerbread oat bars!
These past few months can be labelled as the baked oatmeal months on the blog. Since I started making baled oatmeal, I’ve fallen in love with the texture and love to play around with the flavor options. Be it PB&J baked oatmeal, Pumpkin Baked Oatmeal or Banana Bread Baked Oatmeal.

Just 10 everyday ingredients, No added Oil, no added refined sugar(omit candied ginger) and takes just 10 minutes to put together. Bake, slice and serve warm or cold! No gummy Oatmeal! Its fluffy and just the right amount of soft. Top the oatmeal with nuts or spices, and serve with maple syrup or whipped coconut cream.

My Books: https://veganricha.com/books
#easyveganrecipes #veganricha #veganbreakfastt #bakedoatmeal #gingerebreadbakedoatmeal

recipeIngredient: 2 cups old fashioned oats (,use certified gluten-free if needed, see notes for substitution)
1.5 tsp gingerbread spice (or 1 tsp gingerbread spice + 1/2 tsp cinnamon)
3 tbsp chopped pecans or walnuts (, or omit for nutfree)
3 tbsp light molasses ((or 2 tbsp dark molasses))
1 cup  warm non dairy milk such as coconut or almond
optional add ins: chopped dates (,chocolate chips, dried fruit)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the dry ingredients from oats to chia seeds in a baking dish(9 by 9 inch or 8 by 10 inch or similar). Add dates or other optional add ins and mix in. Add the molasses, maple, non dairy milk and apple sauce and mix well. Let the mixture sit for 15 mins for the oats to soak in some of the liquid. Top the oatmeal with halved pecans(optional)
recipeInstructions.name: Mix all the dry ingredients from oats to chia seeds in a baking dish(9 by 9 inch or 8 by 10 inch or similar). Add dates or other optional add ins and mix in. Add the molasses, maple, non dairy milk and apple sauce and mix well. Let the mixture sit for 15 mins for the oats to soak in some of the liquid. Top the oatmeal with halved pecans(optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 deg F (180 c). Bake the oatmeal for 35 to 40 mins. Take the pan out of the oven, Brush some maple syrup so the pecans get a glaze.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 deg F (180 c). Bake the oatmeal for 35 to 40 mins. Take the pan out of the oven, Brush some maple syrup so the pecans get a glaze.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool for 10 mins, then Slice and serve with whipped coconut cream, yogurt, or maple syrup.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool for 10 mins, then Slice and serve with whipped coconut cream, yogurt, or maple syrup.

recipeInstructions.text: Store: Store unbaked at step 4. Store the baked oatmeal in a closed container in the fridge for upto 4 days.
recipeInstructions.name: Store: Store unbaked at step 4. Store the baked oatmeal in a closed container in the fridge for upto 4 days.

recipeInstructions.text: Reheat: Reheat the refrigerated oatmeal in a microwave or in the oven for 10 mins or so to crisp
recipeInstructions.name: Reheat: Reheat the refrigerated oatmeal in a microwave or in the oven for 10 mins or so to crisp
